name: RemoveEmbedItemFromBoard
description:
Remove an embed item from a Miro board.

This tool deletes a specific embed item from a Miro board. It should be called when there's a need to remove an embedded element from a board, such as cleaning up or updating board contents.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which the embed item will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: item_id_to_delete
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the embed item to be deleted from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
